entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
